books.author: by Danielle Steel
books.description: The beautiful mistress of a Russian oligarch falls in love with an artist and yearns for freedom.
books.name: THE MISTRESS

books.author: by W. Bruce Cameron
books.description: A canine narrator undergoes a series of reincarnations.
books.name: A DOG'S PURPOSE

books.author: by Stuart Woods
books.description: The New York lawyer Stone Barrington faces danger when he finds himself in possession of a retired C.I.A. agent’s explosive memoir.
books.name: BELOW THE BELT

books.author: by Fredrik Backman
books.description: A curmudgeon's gruff exterior masks a generosity of spirit. Originally published in Sweden in 2014.
books.name: A MAN CALLED OVE

books.author: by John Grisham
books.description: A whistleblower alerts a Florida investigator to judicial corruption involving the Mob and Indian casinos.
books.name: THE WHISTLER

books.author: by Paula Hawkins
books.description: A psychological thriller set in the environs of London is full of complications and betrayals.
books.name: THE GIRL ON THE TRAIN

books.author: by Kristin Hannah
books.description: When her seemingly perfect marriage falters, a former artist embraces some much-needed reinvention.
books.name: DISTANT SHORES

books.author: by Rupi Kaur
books.description: Poetic approaches to surviving adversity and loss.
books.name: MILK AND HONEY

books.author: by James Patterson
books.description: Detective Alex Cross and his wife, Bree, team up to catch a killer causing chaos in Washington, D.C.
books.name: CROSS THE LINE

books.author: by Jodi Picoult
books.description: A medical crisis entangles a black nurse, a white supremacist father and a white lawyer.
books.name: SMALL GREAT THINGS

books.author: by Colson Whitehead
books.description: A teenage girl heads north on the network that helped slaves escape to freedom, envisioned in this novel as a secret system of actual tracks and tunnels.
books.name: THE UNDERGROUND RAILROAD

books.author: by Nicholas Sparks
books.description: A man who became a single father after both his marriage and his business collapsed learns to take a chance on a new love.
books.name: TWO BY TWO

books.author: by David Baldacci
books.description: John Puller, a special agent with the Army, searches for the truth about his mother, who disappeared 30  years ago.
books.name: NO MAN'S LAND

books.author: by Catherine Anderson
books.description: Sissy is convinced she doesn't need a man, until she meets a former rodeo star.
books.name: MULBERRY MOON

books.author: by Ian McGuire
books.description: An opium-addicted surgeon clashes with a psychopath on an Arctic-bound whaler.
books.name: THE NORTH WATER
